name: printPdf
description: Used for printing PDF documents on browsers. Print according to PDF url. Compatible with most browsers except chrome and IE # Usage > if don't use npm,please read source code and copy code as needed ```javasrcipt npm install ``` # Demo ```html <body>     <button onclick="print()">打印</button>     <script type="module">         import printPdf from './printPdf';         print = async() => {             console.log('Printing...')             const url = 'http://xxx/one.pdf';             let printRes = await printPdf(url);             console.log('Print Successfully')         }     </script> </body> ```
